doc.previous: In 1995 Gabriel and Cape Verdean human rights activist Vera Duarte were awarded the North South Prize in its inaugural year 44 45
doc.after: In the late 1990s Gabriel and entrepreneur Richard Branson discussed with Nelson Mandela their idea of a small dedicated group of leaders working objectively and without any vested personal interest to solve difficult global conflicts
